assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Kanto Denka Kogyo Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells various chemical products in Japan and internationally. It operates through Fundamental Chemicals Division, Fine Chemicals Division, Ferrochemicals Division, Commercial Business Division, and Facilities Division. The company's Fundamental Chemicals Division manufactures and sells inorganic products including liquid caustic soda, caustic soda flakes, hydrochloric acid, sodium hypochlorite, and aluminum chloride; and organic products, such as trichloroethylene, perchloroethylene, vinylidene chloride, and cyclohexanol which are used for paper and pulp, water treatment, pharmaceutical and agricultural intermediates, cleaning of metal parts, and hydrofluorocarbon application. It's Fine Chemicals Division, engages in the manufacture and sale of fine chemicals including fluorinated gases and battery materials. The company's Ferrochemicals Division manufactures and sells ferrochemical products, such as reprographics carriers and magnetite that are used in printers, and reprographics and environmentally friendly carriers. It's Commercial Business Division sells fundamental chemicals and fine chemicals; and provides maintenance for containers and other services. The company's Facilities Division engages in the facility-related construction work. In addition, it offers fluorochemical gases, which are used for etching and cleaning in semiconductor manufacturing; organic fluorine compounds used as materials for liquid crystals; silicon tetrafluoride for optical fibers; and sulfur hexafluoride used in high capacity transformers. The company was founded in 1938 and is headquartered in Chiyoda, Japan.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Yasutoshi  Suzuki
